Title: What are the page sizes used by Windows on various processors? | The Old New Thing
Description: One detail I’ve been overlooking in my processor retrospective series is the choice of page size. For many processors, the page size is dictated by the processor, but some processors give you a choice.  Processor Page size Reasonable choices  Normal Large  x86-32 without PAE 4KB 4MB 4KB only  x86-32 with PAE 4KB 2MB 4KB only  x86-64 4KB 2MB 4KB only  SH-4 4KB — 1KB,
